{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=4G-N12 |revision=A1 |serialnum_prefix=90IG01I0-BM3G00 |asin=B00UVOF3SE;GB; |est_release_date=04/09/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=MR7015AL |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, LTE router, |fcc_id=MSQ-4GN12 |pcb_id=141701520006J |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5358U;BCM5358UB0; |cpu1_cspeed=530 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5358U;BCM5358UB0; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=4G modem, LTE modem, SIM Card slot |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=54:A0:50 |oui_eth=54:A0:50 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N300 LTE Modem Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networking/4GN12/ Product Page]
"P/N:141701520006J R01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] [http://www.arcadyan.com/contentPage.aspx?type=product-detail&L2id=7&prod2id=22 MR7015AL] Model Part Num: 90IG01I0-BM3G00
===Overview=== *4G LTE mobile broadband for fast internet speeds up to 100Mbps *Wireless-N speeds up to 300Mbps for reliable Wi-Fi connections *Built-in Dual-WAN connection for home and office connectivity *Dual-purpose wired LAN/WAN Ethernet port
===Specifications=== *LTE: Downlink 100Mbps / Uplink 50Mbps *HSPA+: Downlink 28Mbps / Uplink 11Mbps *4G FDD-LTE: 800 /1800 /2600 *3G UMTS: 900 /2100 *Antenna: :Internal 3x 2dBi antenna for Wi-Fi :Fixed 2x 2dBi antenna for Mobile
===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/197-asus-4g-n12.html ''ASUS 4G-N12'' on '''FoxNetWork'''] :OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=54:A0:50 54:A0:50]
===See also=== *[[ASUS 4G-AC68U]] - ''AC1900 Dual-Band LTE Wi-Fi Modem Router'' *[[ASUS 4G-AC55U]] - [https://www.asus.com/Networking/4G-LTE-3G-Routers-Products/ ''Wireless-AC LTE Modem Gigabit Router''] :OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=AC:9E:17 AC:9E:17] • [https://klseet.com/index.php/198-tm-unifi/unifi-asus/asus-news-update/308-asus-new-product-update-2015-q1 klseet] • [http://us.hardware.info/productinfo/276404/asus-$g-ac55u-dual-band-wireless-ac1200-lte-modem-router/photos HW]
